title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 762 - Approval Of Home Care Programs And Program Changes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 762 - Approval Of Home Care Programs And Program Changes

State Regulations
§ 762.1 - Long term home health care program and aids home care program approval
§ 762.2 - Certified home health agency, long term home health care program and aids home care program construction
§ 762.3 - Repealed
§ 762.4 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 762

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 3803[2], 3612[s]; Social Services Law, § 367-M[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
